description: Grants the user the ability to generate and control various types of poison, making them a Poison Human. The user can create poison of varying toxicity and lethality.

users.circumstances: Magellan is the current user of the Doku Doku no Mi and serves as Warden of Impel Down

abilityReveals.description: Magellan shoots a concentrated poison ball from his mouth as a ranged projectile attack. The poison ball can be dodged but is highly dangerous if it makes contact.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used against Luffy during their battle on Level 4, forcing him to dodge the deadly projectile.

abilityReveals.description: Magellan breathes out large amounts of poisonous breath, creating a fog-like cover in an area. This poisonous fog not only blurs the sight of any opponent caught within but also slowly weakens them by attacking their nervous system.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used to disorient and weaken Luffy during their battle, preventing him from fighting effectively.

abilityReveals.description: Magellan creates a massive dragon-like formation of poison with multiple heads that can completely engulf opponents. This is one of his most powerful and devastating techniques.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Summoned against Luffy in Gear Second, completely engulfing him in deadly poison and ultimately defeating him.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
User suffers from severe diarrhea due to constant poison exposure, spending significant time in the bathroom

strengths.strength: Can create various types of poison with different effects and toxicity levels
strengths.description: The versatility of poison creation makes this fruit extremely dangerous in combat.

strengths.strength: Poison can attack opponents' nervous systems and senses, not just cause physical damage
strengths.description: The Venom Cloud technique demonstrates this ability to disorient and disable opponents beyond direct physical harm.

strengths.strength: Multiple forms of attack - close range, projectile, and area of effect
strengths.description: Magellan can adapt his poison abilities for different combat situations with techniques like Hydra, Venom Blowfish, and Venom Cloud.
